nodes.text: Kelara Sakoal was a Human female who was the wife of Gann Sakoal during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, her husband was always concerned that she might have entered relationships with other men. She eventually fell in love with Harez Bant who was revealed to be a Republic spy. After betraying her husband, she decided to help Bant in stealing vital data discs that Gann developed. Her plan was exposed when she was found by an Imperial spacer that was sent to find her. After Bant was killed, she noticed that her escort is strikingly often looked. When her husband revealed that he intended to kill her for betraying him, she was soon escorted by an Imperial spacer and later executed for traitorous act against her husband.
